generated_text:
- road: The image shows a cobblestone street where vehicles are driving, which qualifies as a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area on the right side of the road, bordered by stone bollards and vegetation, which is designated for pedestrians and is thus a sidewalk.
- building: The image contains multiple buildings, including a brick building on the left with signage and a large modern building in the background with scaffolding.
- vegetation: There are trees and bushes visible along the sidewalk and in the background.
- car: Several cars are parked or driving on the road, including a prominent silver Opel in the foreground.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign with a red border and a blue background is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several small, vertically oriented poles (bollards) are placed along the sidewalk.
- person: A person can be seen walking in the distance on the sidewalk to the right.
